articles.author: Krystal Kasal
articles.title: New DNA evidence from Crimea sheds light on Neanderthal migration into Asia - Phys.org
articles.description: Researchers have long been attempting to piece together the trek of Neanderthals from Europe into Asia around the Middle and Upper Paleolithic time periods. This time marks the eventual disappearance of Neanderthals and the transition to a Homo-sapien-dominat…
